title: Badtameez Dil
albumInfo: A vibrant, energetic track from the movie Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani that has become an anthem for fun and carefree moments.

title: Levitating
albumInfo: A hit pop track from Dua Lipa's album 'Future Nostalgia', known for its upbeat and funky vibes, perfect for uplifting any mood.

title: Heypillagada
albumInfo: A catchy and peppy number from the movie 'Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani', known for its lively beats and energetic vibe.

title: Let Her Go
albumInfo: A soulful ballad with deep emotional resonance, 'Let Her Go' is a heart-wrenching song about love, loss, and regret.

title: Agar Tum Saath Ho
albumInfo: A poignant and beautiful love song from the movie 'Tamasha', capturing the emotions of longing and the pain of separation.

title: Vellipomaakey
albumInfo: A beautiful romantic melody from the movie 'Sankarabharanam', where the soothing tones of the music are perfect for reflective moments.

title: Tum Hi Ho
albumInfo: A soulful and calming love song from the movie 'Aashiqui 2'.

title: Yentha Sakkagunnaave
albumInfo: A mellow track from 'Rangasthalam' that calms the mind with soothing music.

title: Samajavaragamana
albumInfo: A serene melody from the movie 'Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo' that gives a peaceful vibe.

title: Big Dawg
albumInfo: An energetic and hard-hitting song that pumps you up with its powerful beats.

title: Nashe Si Chadh Gayi
albumInfo: A lively and peppy song from the movie 'Befikre'.

title: APT.
albumInfo: A pop-punk anthem from ROSÉ's first studio album 'rosie,' featuring Bruno Mars. The song blends English and Korean lyrics, inviting listeners to a lively party at an apartment.

title: We Will Rock You
albumInfo: An anthem of motivation and power by the legendary Queen.

title: Ashapasam
albumInfo: A motivational song from the Telugu film 'C/O Kancherlapalem', inspiring courage and hope.

title: Who Says
albumInfo: An empowering anthem of self-acceptance and confidence.
